name: Mexican Rice
briefdescription: This Mexican rice recipe is simple to make by simmering cumin-seasoned rice in tomato sauce and chicken broth for a restaurant-style side dish.
instructions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and season with garlic salt and cumin; cook, stirring constantly, until puffed and golden.
Add onion; cook and stir until onion has softened. Stir in chicken broth and tomato sauce; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork.

comments.comment: This is a very good and easy way to make restaurant style mexican rice. Flavorful and delicious. It uses more liquid than I am used to, but with time, it makes very good rice.
